metadata.synopsis: In case only 2 gnomes from Act1/2 made it to Act3, this gnome is added inside Ironhand basement.

0.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
0.text: It's too quiet up there. Hope the blacksmith hasn't sold us out - or you.
0.context: NodeContext: Irritable anxiety; accusatory of the player on "you"

1.speaker: Fuffi Fuffers
1.text: If anyone comes down here with ill intent, they're gonna regret it. Pass it on, friend.
